text: The Emirate of Bukhara (Persian: امارت بخارا Amārat-e Bokhārā, Chagatai: بخارا امرلیگی Bukhārā Amirligi, Uzbek: Buxoro amirligi) was a nation that was located in Central Asia that existed from 1785 to 1920 in what is now modern- day Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Kazakhstan. ==References== Category:Former countries in Central Asia Category:Former monarchies of Asia
title: Emirate of Bukhara
